description.b: This cheat sheet demonstrates how to use the ARTIST Methodology Process Tool (MPT) WebApp configure the migration methodology using the results of the analysis performed by the MAT, TFT and BFT tools in the previous steps.
At first step you need to log into the MPT WebApp using your credentials. If you do not have the required credentials, you need to register first.

item.title: Upload MAT, TFT and BFT reports into the MPT WebApp

description.b: After logging into the MPT WebApp, click on the "UPLOAD REPORTS" link on the left menu. Select the MAT, TFT and BFT reports from your local file system and upload them using the corresponding buttons.

item.title: Configure MPT WebApp using MAT,TFT and BFT reports

description.b: Click on the CONFIGURE MPT link on the left menu. In the displayed page, select an available MAT, TFT and BFT reports from the dropdown list and press the Configure MPT button.

item.title: View configured ARTIST Methodology from the EPF Composer

description.b: By clicking on the VIEW METHODOLOGY link on the left menu, you will be able to see the configured ARTIST Methodology through the EPF Composer.
Click here to configure the following steps of the tutorial based on the pre-migration results.
